SEARCH
Module com.example.flashcardai
Package db.DAO

Class FlashcardDAO

java.lang.Object
db.DAO.FlashcardDAO
public class FlashcardDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing flashcards in the database. Provides methods to insert, retrieve, update, and delete flashcards, as well as manage spaced repetition metadata.

Flashcards are linked to decks via a foreign key relationship.

      public FlashcardDAO()

  • Method Details

    • insertFlashcard

      public static boolean insertFlashcard(int deckId, String front, String back, String mediaType, String difficulty, String imagePath)
      Inserts a flashcard into a specified deck with full details including optional image.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck
      front - the front content of the flashcard
      back - the back content of the flashcard
      mediaType - the media type (e.g., "text", "image")
      difficulty - the difficulty level (e.g., "easy", "medium", "hard")
      imagePath - the image path (nullable)
      Returns:
      true if the insert was successful, false otherwise

    • getFlashcardsByDeckId

      public static List<Flashcard> getFlashcardsByDeckId(int deckId)
      Retrieves all flashcards for a specific deck.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck
      Returns:
      a list of Flashcard objects

    • getFlashcardById

      public static Flashcard getFlashcardById(int id)
      Retrieves a single flashcard by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flashcard
      Returns:
      the Flashcard object if found, or null if not found

    • updateFlashcard

      public static boolean updateFlashcard(int id, String front, String back, String difficulty, String mediaType, String imagePath)
      Updates the content and metadata of a flashcard.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flashcard
      front - the new front content
      back - the new back content
      difficulty - the new difficulty level
      mediaType - the new media type
      imagePath - the new image path (nullable)
      Returns:
      true if updated successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteFlashcard

      public static boolean deleteFlashcard(int cardId)
      Deletes a flashcard from the database.
      Parameters:
      cardId - the ID of the flashcard to delete
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • insertFlashcard

      public static boolean insertFlashcard(int deckId, String front, String back)
      Inserts a flashcard with only front and back text (simplified overload).
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck
      front - the front content
      back - the back content
      Returns:
      true if inserted successfully, false otherwise

    • updateFlashcardDifficulty

      public static void updateFlashcardDifficulty(int flashcardId, String difficulty) throws SQLException
      Updates the difficulty of a flashcard.
      Parameters:
      flashcardId - the ID of the flashcard
      difficulty - the new difficulty level
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the update fails

    • updateSpacedRepetitionData

      public static void updateSpacedRepetitionData(int flashcardId, int repetitions, double easinessFactor, String lastReviewedAt, String nextReviewAt) throws SQLException
      Updates spaced repetition parameters for a flashcard.
      Parameters:
      flashcardId - the ID of the flashcard
      repetitions - the new repetition count
      easinessFactor - the updated easiness factor
      lastReviewedAt - the timestamp of last review
      nextReviewAt - the next scheduled review timestamp
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the update fails

    • getDueFlashcards

      public static List<Flashcard> getDueFlashcards(int deckId)
      Retrieves flashcards from a deck that are due for review.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck
      Returns:
      a list of due Flashcard objects
